educationalAlignment.description: An alignment to an established educational framework.
educationalAlignment.title: Educational Alignment

educationalUse.description: he purpose of the work in the context of education. Ex: "assignment", "group work"
educationalUse.title: Educational Use

timeRequired.description: Approximate or typical time it takes to work with or through this learning resource for the typical intended target audience. Ex: "P30M", "P1H25M"
timeRequired.title: Time Required

typicalAgeRange.description: The typical range of ages the contentâ€™s intended end user. Ex: "7-9", "18-"
typicalAgeRange.title: Typical Age Range

interactivityType.description: The predominant mode of learning supported by the learning resource. Acceptable values are active, expositive, or mixed.
interactivityType.title: Interactivity Type

learningResourceType.description: The predominant type or kind characterizing the learning resource. Ex: "presentation", "handout"
learningResourceType.title: Learning Resource Type

useRightsUrl.description: The URL where the owner specifies permissions for using the resource. Ex: "http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/", "http://publisher.com/content-use-description"
useRightsUrl.title: Use Rights URL

isBasedOnUrl.description: A resource that was used in the creation of this resource. This term can be repeated for multiple sources. Ex: "http://example.com/great-multiplication-intro.html"
isBasedOnUrl.title: Is Based On URL
